-----

THIS one was for Nikki's birthday and I forgot to post it on here OTL.

But yeah! I wanted to go for a darkroom feel. But PINK instead of red. Or I guess magenta. Really, this would not work as a real darkroom but boy does it look pretty!

+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]
